short_summary: Ice retention ice boom operation services
description: A Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of services for theice retention ice boom operation,
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

**Notice ID**: F7047-230004

**English Title**: Ice retention boom operations on the St. Lawrence
**French Title**: L'exploitation des estacades de retenue des glaces du Saint-Laurent

## Publication Details

* **Public Notice Date**: December 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Announcement Amendment Date**: February 6, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 31, 2026

## Procurement Details

* This is a **.Request for Proposal** for the Ice Retention Boom Operation Services on the St. Lawrence River.
* The procurement category is **Shared Services** and the procurement method is **Competitive Open Bidding**.
* The selection criteria is **Lowest Price**.
* The trade agreements applicable to this tender include: 
    * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* **End User Entity Address**: 200 Kent St, Oval, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Officer**: Kaveh Mirfatahi, SPAC/PSPC, kaveh.mirfatahi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
